Technique notes
  • Use multiple browsers for compartmentalization (work, research, privacy).
  • Test vendors with fingerprinting & tracking tools for true privacy claims.
  • Chromium forks (Brave, Iridium, Ungoogled) vary widely in telemetry removal.
  • Firefox forks (Waterfox, LibreWolf, Pale Moon) retain legacy add-ons or remove telemetry.
